description: A square temple located 100 yards south-east of the forum of Silchester Roman town. Lewis (1966) suggests a construction date of the later 1st CE and a period of destruction in the late 3rd CE as the statue was smashed.
bibliography: Boon, G. C. In Roman Silchester, 121, 1957.
St. John Hope, W. H. “Excavations on the Site of the Roman City at Silchester, Hants, in 1907.” Archaeologia 61 (1908): 206 ff.
